page.title: 16Churches, North Murroes
page.content:
The main church in this area is the Church of Scotland. The minister at Murroes is the Rev. Helen Johnstone. She was the{first } {lady minister}in Dundee. In 1983 Tealing Church united with Murroes and was then linked with Auchterhouse. Tealing Church then closed, but is reopening soon as a{heritage centre } with exhibits from all over Scotland. Recently the Rev.G. Mackenzie took over from Mr. Chisholm at Monikie. {Monikie and Newbigging}which had been linked were then united. At present both churches are still being used.
Most Church of Scotland members in the area attend either Murroes or Monikie, but members of other churches eg. the Episcopal or Roman Catholic Churches, must worship in Broughty Ferry or Dundee.
